report.title: Explore records 3 mapping using index_locations_samples
report.description: Report designed for the explore records mapping facility in iRecord, with additional parameters. This version depends on the Spatial Index Builder module to index the list of locations that users can set in their preferences as their locality, for significantly improved performance. It also defaults to recent records only.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences o JOIN websites w on w.id=o.website_id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND ('#record_status#'<>'' OR (o.record_status not in ('I','T') AND (#ownData#=1 OR o.record_status not in ('D','R')))) #idlist#

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include

param.name: idlist
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence IDs to filter to.

param.name: currentUser
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. Allows a column to be output indicating that the user owns the record.

param.name: location_id
param.description: Provide the location to display records for

param.name: ownLocality
param.join: JOIN index_locations_samples lfilter ON lfilter.sample_id=o.sample_id and lfilter.location_id=#location_id#

param.name: taxon_groups
param.description: List of taxon group IDs to view data for

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.name: date_from
param.where: ('#date_from#'='Click here' OR o.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date))

param.name: date_to
param.where: ('#date_to#'='Click here' OR o.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date))

param.name: user_filter
param.description: Use this to filter the list to a warehouse user ID other than the current user

column.name: taxon
column.sql: CASE WHEN o.preferred_taxon=o.default_common_name then o.preferred_taxon ELSE o.preferred_taxon || COALESCE(' | ' || o.default_common_name, '') END

column.name: recorder
column.sql: CASE WHEN w.id IN (#website_ids#) THEN '' ELSE w.title || '-> ' END || CASE WHEN LENGTH(o.recorders)>30 THEN 'Recorder' ELSE o.recorders END

column.name: sc
column.sql: case o.record_status when 'C' then case o.certainty when 'C' then 'green' when 'L' then 'orange' when 'U' then '#800000' else 'blue' end when 'V' then 'green' when 'D' then 'orange' when 'R' then '#800000' else 'black' end

column.name: fc
column.sql: case o.record_status when 'V' then 'green' when 'D' then 'orange' when 'R' then '#800000' else 'blue' end
